_comments.memoryDirectory: Directory where memory files are stored (relative or absolute path)
_comments.taskDirectory: Directory where task files are stored (relative or absolute path)
_comments.autoOpenBrowser: Automatically open browser when dashboard starts (true/false)
_comments.preferredPort: Preferred port number for the dashboard server (1024-65535)
_comments.logLevel: Logging level: debug, info, warn, error
_comments.showStartupBanner: Show startup banner and progress messages (true/false)
_comments.createDirectories: Automatically create directories if they don't exist (true/false)
_comments.backupOnStartup: Create backups before starting the dashboard (true/false)

_advanced_options.Note: These options can be added to the configuration file for advanced users
_advanced_options.windowsPaths: The system automatically converts paths for Windows compatibility
_advanced_options.environmentVariables: Some settings can be overridden with environment variables
_advanced_options.portRange: If preferred port is busy, the system will try ports +1, +2, etc. up to +20
_advanced_options.backupLocation: Backups are stored in ./data-backups/ directory with timestamps
_advanced_options.logLocation: Log files are stored in ./logs/ directory with timestamps
